sentences.sContent: You have to grant us control explicitly.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have to grant us control explicitly.
sentences.sCn: 你们必须允许我们明确地控制。

sentences.sContent: Tell them explicitly you want to continue the friendship.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tell them explicitly you want to continue the friendship.
sentences.sCn: 明确地告诉他们你想继续这段友谊。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, you need to include these in your source files explicitly.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, you need to include these in your source files explicitly.
sentences.sCn: 因此，您需要将这些都明确地包含进源文件中。

words.tran: 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的
